# Project Goals
Our goal for the first phase of the project was to explore a variety of methodologies for extracting data from PDF files and begin exploratory analysis on this textual information. We plan to use tThe resulting data will be used in the following stages of our project, which will analyzes the career progression of soldiers across Army branches. As a by-product of our project, we will contribute information pertaining to Large Language Models (LLMs) to open source-repositories.
